product_name: Mountain Hardwear Canyon Sun Hiker Hat - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Mountain Hardwear Canyon Sun Hiker Hat offers sun coverage on the trail with lightweight, breathable nylon fabric and mesh panels for ventilation. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Closed-cell foam brim allows hat to float; dark color under brim reduces glare. The Mountain Hardwear Canyon Sun Hiker Hat features a Coolmax(R) sweatband that wicks moisture away from the head for comfort. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Mountain Hardwear Canyon Sun Hiker Hat offers sun coverage on the trail with lightweight, breathable nylon fabric and mesh panels for ventilation.
